rows.label: tlk41200141_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Some Drivers took me and Dad away
and before we knew it, we were here!

rows.label: tlk41200141_01_msg0002
rows.name:
It was really, really scary...
My house got burned down...
And I lost all my friends...

rows.label: tlk41200141_01_msg0003
rows.name:
The people said we can't go back to
Iraada Village any more. I'm getting
really lonely...
